jUJSNRpL.question: Explain the working principle of a gaseous fire detection system:

options.text: A closed tube, when heated, causes the gas inside to expand and trigger an alarm via a pressure switch.
A closed tube, when heated, causes the gas inside to become a conductor and thereby closes an alarm circuit.
A closed tube consists of a gas which changes its translucence when heated. Light sensors will sense such change in translucence and trigger an alarm.
A closed tube, when heated, causes the gas inside to contract which causes a negative pressure and thereby trigger an alarm via a pressure switch.

Csa4m37z.question:
Refer to figure 021-13.
When fire is detected on engine #2, the fire shutoff handle #2 is pulled and the extinguishing agent #1 is discharged. This results in:

options.text: the discharge of fire extinguisher bottle #2 and illumination of the DISCH indicator lamp of agent #1 on engine #2 and DISCH indicator lamp of agent #2 on engine #1.
the discharge of fire extinguisher bottle #1 and illumination of the DISCH indicator lamp of agent #1 on both engines.
the discharge of fire extinguisher bottle #2 and illumination of the DISCH indicator lamp of agent #1 on engine #1 and agent #2 on engine #2.
the discharge of fire extinguisher bottle #1 and illumination of the DISCH (discharge) indicator lamp.

WURj9E4o.question:
Assess the statements given below regarding Halon fire extinguishers.
1.  When released from a Venturi under pressure, Halon acts as a cooling agent.
2.  Halon should only be used with caution, as it is highly corrosive on aluminum components.

options.text: 1 and 2 are both incorrect.
1 is incorrect, 2 is correct.
1 is correct, 2 is incorrect.
1 and 2 are both correct.

Qkak3Bx0.question: Describe the functional principle of rain repellent liquid.

options.text: Hydrophobic chemicals prevent droplets from adhering to the window surface.
Chemical reactions using up heat energy cool down the rain droplets and cause the formation of ice pellets which are blown away by the airflow.
Heat-releasing chemical reactions cause the water to evaporate.
Flooding the entire windscreen with a thin layer of liquid provides clear view even with rain falling on it.

I49hq8ja.question: Evaluate the following statements about engine fire extinguishers. - A twin-engine aeroplane certified under CS-25 needs a minimum of two independent engine fire extinguishers. - Every engine of an aeroplane certified under CS-25 needs to be provided with two individual extinguishing shots.

options.text: 1 and 2 are both correct
1 is false, 2 is correct
1 and 2 are both false
1 is correct, 2 is false

8rH90Ey4.question: In a fire protection system, a continuous loop detector is used in..

options.text: an overheat detection system.
a smoke detection system.
a firefighting system.
a carbon dioxide warning system.

fZ55MhIw.question: Regarding fire detection, ion detectors are used to detect

options.text: smoke
fire.
over temperature and fire.
over temperature.

j5DNDTDV.question: Power plant fire extinguishers are operated by:

options.text: an electrically fired cartridge rupturing a seal in the head of the bottle.
manual remote control opening a discharge valve.
an electrically heated capsule rupturing a seal in the pipeline at the engine.
a mechanical link withdrawing a safety pin and allowing a spring operated plunger to rupture the bottle seal.

hmaQZDhh.question: If a gas-filled fire detector becomes broken, the result will be ...

options.text: a decrease in pressure, causing a loop fault indication.
an increase in pressure, causing a fire warning.
an increase in pressure, causing a loop fault indication.
a decrease in pressure, causing a fire warning.

wJfvVgaY.question: If a firewire type detection system has a break in the line, what will happen when the system is tested?

options.text: No FAULT light, no visual or aural alerts.
FAULT light, master warning light.
FAULT light, engine fire light.
FAULT light, bell warning.

tWxM1N0z.question: In addition to fire detection/protection, most auxiliary power units (APUs) have automatic controls for starting, stopping and maintaining operation within safe limits. These controls provide correct sequencing of the starting cycle as well as protection against

options.text: high turbine gas temperature (TGT), overspeed, loss of oil pressure and high oil temperature.
high TGT and loss of oil pressure only.
high TGT only.
overspeed and high oil temperature only.

jdXGL79K.question: If an engine fire detection loop is broken, what is the indication when the fire warning system is tested for that engine?

options.text: No indication or a fault alert.
A fault alert and a red master warning light.
A fault alert and a fire warning light.
A fault alert and a fire warning bell.

zrW8I73K.question: If the two loops of an engine fire detection system detect a low resistance and a low capacity

options.text: The loops are faulty.
The engine is on fire.
The system is under test.
Everything is normal.

7mrEaPd2.question: A fault protection circuit in a fire detection system will:

options.text: inhibit the fire detector when the detection line is connected to ground.
automatically initiate APU shutdown and fire extinguisher striker activation in the event of fire.
activate an alarm in the cockpit and in the landing gear bay for ground crew.
activate the fire detection system when the detection line is connected to ground.

iK4eGgHB.question: Smoke detector systems are installed in the

options.text: upper cargo compartments (class E).
fuel tanks.
engine nacelles.
wheel wells.

BDPJyX8T.question: Select the correct option regarding smoke detectors used in modern transport aeroplanes.

options.text: In a labyrinth optical smoke detector, the light source is shielded from the photoelectric sensor.
In a labyrinth optical smoke detector, the light source is refracted away from the sensor by the smoke particles.
In a light attenuation optical smoke detector, the light source is refracted on to the sensor by the smoke particles.
In a light attenuation optical smoke detector, the light source is shielded from the photoelectric sensor.

PrPMYrGP.question: When a continuous loop wire type fire detection system is tested

options.text: the wiring and the warning are tested.
a part of the wire is heated.
only the warning function is tested.
the whole wire is heated.

E4BVYgDH.question: Why are two loops used in an engine fire detection system?

options.text: Both loops must normally detect a fire or overheat to trigger a warning.
It is more energy-efficient to have two parallel loops.
Two loops increase electrical capacitance in a gas-filled detector.
Two loops reduce electrical resistance in a gas-filled detector.

HjY4imba.question: During the test sequence of the Fire Detection System, the "TEST" light does not illuminate and the pilot has no other visual confirmation. Which of the following statements is correct?

options.text: The circuit is not grounded because of a breakin the wire between the detectors, therefore the light(s) will not illuminate.
This is normal. Only if the “FAIL” light illuminates during the test sequence is there is a problem.
This is normal. The light(s)remain(s) off because there is no real fire.
As long as the aural indication sounds, the system is operating properly, because the aural cue has a higher priority.

tfQml9EH.question: When a part of a resistive type continuous loop fire detection system is heated, its resistance ... (1) and the current ... (2). Which terms correctly complete the sentence ?

options.text: 1. decreases, 2. increases
1. decreases, 2. decreases
1. increases, 2. increases
1. increases, 2. decreases

h85ZjU86.question: The command to discharge a main engine fire extinguisher is activated

manually when a high oil temperature is indicated.
automatically when an overheat is detected.
automatically when a fire is detected.

options.text: 1 is correct, 2 is correct.
1 is incorrect, 2 is incorrect.
1 is correct, 2 is incorrect.
1 is incorrect, 2 is correct.

2nMIxLal.question: In the event of a fire in a gas turbine engine:

an automatic shut off valve is moved to the closed position controlled by the fire sensing system.
the fuel supply is disconnected by a quick release coupling.

bleed air.

WDUD2qfu.question: How will a fire warning be indicated?

A light attenuation optical detector - light refracts towards the photosensitive cell.

Causes the water to absorb in to the liquid

NLwX6Liv.question: How does windshield coating repel rain?

The hydrophobic property of the coating causes raindrops to reduce in size so that they become almost invisible.

LKwtGVW0.question:

 An increase in surrounding temperature will:
